QuestData.Title: An Inconspicuous Conveyance
QuestData.Description:
[DNT] Our foes watch the skies. I will risk no harm to the future of my flight, so we must travel by less traditional mean.
I ordered a more... down to earth means of transport be acquired, but it seems to have suffered some damage during the exchange. You are undoubtedly more familiar with such things than I, $r, so your assistance in repairing the wagon would be most appreciated.
